standard.head: Standard Property and Value
standard.desc: You may use familiar utility classes for standard values that include any characters except for space or hyphen.

complex.head: Complex Property and Value
complex.desc: Values with a space or hyphen should use an equal sign between the property and value to indicate which is which, with spaces converted to forward slash to keep the multi-value together in one property.
complex.more: Note: box-sizing-border-box would be interpeted as box-sizing-border: box; instead of the intended box-sizing: border-box;, so an = helps in this instance.
